text: is a Japanese manga artist. She is best known for her artwork in Fuzoroi no Renri. Her work, Now loading...! was serialized from 2016 to 2017, and Fuzoroi no Renri has been serialized since 2017. == Work == * Now loading...! title: Mikan Uji
